text: I always tell people that you should only hire people to be on your team if you would work for them.

Founding a company is hard. Most of it isn't smooth. You'll have to make very hard decisions. You have to fire a few people. Therefore, if you don't believe in your mission, giving up is easy. The majority of founders give up. But the best founders don't give up.
Bill Gates has always been a mentor and inspiration for me even before I knew him. Just growing up, I admired how Microsoft was mission-focused.
If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I'am about to do today?
It's more fun to be a pirate than to join the navy.
Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
Your time is limted, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
Stay hungry. Stay foolish.
The only people who never fail are those who never try.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
If you look at what you have in life, you'll always have more. If you look at what you don't have in life, you'll never have enough.
Yesterday is a memory, tomorrow is a hope, but most importantly, today is a reality which should be done well.
Find someone who does not need to ask for anything, but you are willing to give everything.
Live to give as much as you can, not to receive as much as you can.
I don't think that you have any insight whatsoever into your capacity for good until you have some well-developed insight into your capacity for evil.
Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
Without knowledge action is useless and knowledge without action is futile.
The greatest truth is honesty, and the greatest falsehood is dishonesty.
